description_localized.en:
1 Double Bed or 1 Twin Bed
237-sq-foot (22-sq-meter) room with garden views

Internet - WiFi and wired Internet access
Entertainment - 30-inch LCD TV with satellite channels and pay movies
Food & Drink - Room service and minibar
Sleep - Select Comfort bed, premium bedding, and turndown service
Bathroom - Private bathroom, shower/tub combination, slippers, and free toiletries
Practical - Phone, safe, and desk
Comfort - Air conditioning and daily housekeeping
Smoking/Non Smoking
